spec.name: Crédit Du Maroc 4 Building
spec.description: The Crédit Du Maroc 4 Building is a historical residential and commercial structure dating from the 1920s, located in Casablanca's highly valued central district. It is architecturally significant as a prime example of the early Art Deco period that characterized the 'new town' construction. Its preservation and historical value were formally recognized by its designation as a **National Material Patrimony** site in 2018.

timeline.title: Construction Period
timeline.description: The building was completed during the 1920s (Approximate date).

timeline.title: National Material Patrimony Declaration
timeline.description: The building was officially included in the National Material Patrimony of Morocco.

access.comment: Building is inhabited; exterior view is public, interior access is restricted to residents/tenants.
